document_data.caption: Aduniron's home on Goldenrod Street.
document_data.name: Goldenrod Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Goldenrod Street''' was a road in the city of [[Loudwater]] in the [[Delimbiyr Vale]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite web/Legacy of the Green Regent/"A Difference of Opinion" Plot Recap}}
document_data.Location: It lay in the northern High Town area of Loudwater.
document_data.Description: The site of a number of [[elf|elven]] homes, it was a place of simple yet pleasant houses, with flower boxes and [[weeping willow]]s.
document_data.Notable Locations:
* The [[Grotto of Serene Blossoms]], which lay just to the south.
* The shop of [[Verith Oakbow]], a local herbalist, lay at the end of the street.
document_data.Notable Inhabitants:
* [[Aduniron Phelaniityr]], a musician of the noble [[sun elf]] [[Phelaniityr]] family.
* [[Jaylor]] and [[Melindra]], an elven couple.
